name: YuGodot
description:
Drive a powerful 4WD Yugodot around the rally circuit and set a fast time!

WASD to drive
Press R to restart
Press C to switch to hood camera

Made in 2 days for #stopwaitingforgodot jam in Godot!! (Using Godot for the first time)

Current record is 53.893 set by me,
2nd: 55.064, set by Fyodor Shchukin

Day 2 version:

  • Added a bit of post processing (fog and AO)
  • Added a hood camera (switch on C)
  • Now front wheels also throw dirt, but rReduced total amount of particles
  • A bit more sideways traction at low velocity

V3:

  • Improved dirt particle performance
  • Added best time which stays on during the playthrough (it will reset if you shutdown the game tho)
  • Added relative splits compared to the best run's splits
  • Times are now limited to 3 decimal points

V4:

  • Added collideable split sign props
  • Improved split gate positioning
  • Improved the look of the car, textured

v5:

  • Fixed "lingering particles"
  • Adjusted particles looks
  • You can now adjust suspension spring and damper rates in config.ini
  • Added a few more settings in config.ini

v6:

  • Fixed sector difference timing (split). It didn't work as intended at all before
  • You can now see the split diff green/red after finishing a best run, they don't all turn red immediately (except after the first run)
  • Fixed an issue where left wheels were emitting right side particles (oversight due to flipped X direction in Godot)
